subject: Football
lead_paragraph: James Johnson set a Grey Cup record with three interceptions to help the Saskatchewan Roughriders beat the Winnipeg Blue Bombers, 23-19, in Toronto. It was Saskatchewan’s first Canadian Football League title in 18 years.
